content: ज्यायस् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (सी {%<ab>f.</ab>%}; <ab>compar.</ab> of प्रशस्य, वृद्ध) {@--1@} Elder, senior; प्रसवक्रमेण स किल ज्यायान् <ls>U. 6.</ls> {@--2@} Superior, more excellent or worthy; <ls>Ms. 4. 8</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">3. 137</ls>; <ls>Bg. 3. 1</ls>, <ls n="Bg. 3.">8.</ls> {@--3@} Larger, greater. {@--4@} (In law) One not a minor, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} come of age and responsible for his own action. {@--5@} Aged, old. {@--6@} Decayed, worn out.
